titleStmt.title: Edwin F. Corey to Ephraim L. Van Winkle
CWG1930

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
Office of COREY & SON,
Notaries and Commissioners,
No. 54 Wall Street.
New York, August 24th 1864
Hon. E. L. Van Winkle
Secry of State
Dear Sir.
Your favor bearing date 17th came duly to hand in reply I would most respectfully say that a renewal of my Commission as Commissioner for Kentucky would be a great favor to me.
I enclose herewith the State Tax ($500) with the request that you will foward a new commission at an early day

Very Respy
Your Obt Servt
Edwin F. Corey Jr

Comr Deeds
New York
Edwin F. Corey Jr.
Comd
29th Aug/64
